title: Andrew Sheets: A Tough Road Ahead for the 60/40 Portfolio?
description: On this episode, Chief-Cross Asset Strategist Andrew Sheets continues his discussion on the 10-year outlook for the U.S. and Europe—and identifies the challenges ahead.
